body: Damn this was surprisingly good. The dad got traumatized from his former wife leaving him. He probably wanted to have a meaningful relationship with his first wife but alas she was a slut. That ended up with the dad instead trying to keep his new wife through sexual means, not with actual bond. Such a sad story really. Remember don't go in a relationship centered only in sexual pleasure. You'll only be setting the bar high. In the end your partner will be seeking other partners who can pleasure them more. Although why I'm telling you this even though I'm a virgin faggot is a mystery to me as well.
This is how every house should be. And then there will be no NTR
man thats kind of sad man
Damn, twisted father and son due to their traumatic experience in the past. Oh, well what do you expect in doujins Haha!

@GreyAlien basically yeah she does truly love them but the dad just can't trust her because of what he's been through. He probably filled the sons head with those thoughts as well and decided to..."test" her. She failed the "test" but the dad and the kid don't want to lose her so they are gonna essentially make her a sex slave so that she'll never want to leave them...even though she doesn't wanna leave them anyway
Wait, whatttttttttttttttttttttttttt? But she loves them! Im so confused it hurts.
